content: elbrook cowl a design by sharon hartley ravelry com/designers/sharon-hartley https //www etsy com/shop/riverroadknits https //riverroadknits com/ instagram @riverroadknits looking for a quick weekend knit a way to use up some worsted scraps or a gift the elbrook hat and cowl may be just what you are looking for if you are making the smaller hat and cowl you can even get both pieces out of a set of 3 murky depths targhee worsted yarn if you are making larger sizes simply flip the mc with one of the cc in the other piece for a matching set this cowl is a quick knit featuring some geometric colorwork and a latvian braid at the top and bottom for an extra pop of color choose the smaller size for a more snug fit or the larger size for slightly more room around the neck these can also be used as swatches for the upcoming elbrook sweater to be released in january ©sharon hartley 1 elbrook cowl october 16 2025 sizing and dimensions abbreviations sizes 1 2 cc1 contrast color 1
